attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The antiquated leasehold laws date back to the eleventh-century and apply only to England, Wales and Hawaii. Scotland managed to replace residential leasehold with commonhold. It is only fair that England and Wales should be relieved of this feudal law.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Abolish Leasehold."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14896.asp

Prime Minister's Office
